channel.title: support on Trisha Gee
channel.description: Recent content in support on Trisha Gee

item.title: Developers hate support, don't they?
item.description: This is Dublin.  Honest.I'm at the end of my first official week doing support for 10gen.  My major achievements are: Learning how to work the coffee machine in the Dublin office.  It's taken me a week to get it, but now I can understand the machine's needs.  Even if my coffee did taste a bit of cleaning fluid this morning.Navigating around Dublin - I led the way to the pub, followed by two people who live here.
